params._executor: Address who called the MessageBus execution function
params._message: Arbitrary message bytes originated from and encoded by the source app contract
params._sender: The address of the source app contract
params._srcChainId: The source chain ID where the transfer is originated from

params.dstToken: the token used on destination chain

params.token: the token used on destination chain
the token used on source chain

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params.dstChainId: the destination chain to purchase NFT on
params.dstCrossChainEndpoint: the CrossChainEndpoint contract on the destination chain
params.maxSlippage: The max slippage accepted, given as percentage in point (pip). Eg. 5000 means 0.5%.
params.order: input order, accquired from the Tofu backend server
params.receiver: the address on destination chain to receive target NFT
params.srcToken: The address of the transfer token.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

executeMessageWithTransfer(address,addre.notice: called by executor on the dst chain to execute the NFT purchase

executeMessageWithTransferFallback(addre.notice: called only if handleMessageWithTransfer was reverted (etc, NFT sold out)

executeMessageWithTransferRefund(address.notice: called on source chain for handling of bridge failures (bad liquidity, bad slippage, etc...)

purchase(uint64,address,address,address,.notice: initiates a cross-chain call the the _chainId chain
